Submodules¶

coffeehouse.api module¶

class coffeehouse.api.API(access_key, endpoint='https://api.intellivoid.net/coffeehouse', loop=None, session=None)¶

Bases: object

Base class for all CoffeeHouse services. It can be instantiated by itself as a holder for the API key, or it can be subclassed by CoffeeHouse services.

Parameters

  • access_key (str) – Access key from coffeehouse.intellivoid.info

  • endpoint (str) – Base URL for all requests, without the trailing slash

  • (`Event loop <https (loop) –

    //docs.python.org/3/library/asyncio-eventloop.html#asyncio-event-loop>`_,

  • optional) – The event loop to be passed to aiohttp.ClientSession

  • session (aiohttp.ClientSession, optional) – The aiohttp.ClientSession object to be used for HTTP requests

async close()¶

Close aiohttp.ClientSession object

coffeehouse.exception module¶

exception coffeehouse.exception.CoffeeHouseError(status_code, content, request_id)¶

Bases: Exception

Exception raised by API errors. The exception message is set to the server’s response.

Parameters

  • status_code (int) – Status code returned by the server

  • message (str) – Response content returned by the server

  • request_id (str) – The request ID returned by the server

static parse_and_raise(status_code, content, request_id)¶

Raise an exception if applicable, otherwise return the response of the method

Parameters

  • status_code (int) – Status code returned by the server

  • content (str) – Response content returned by the server

  • request_id (str) – The request ID returned by the server

Returns

The response returned by the server

Return type

response (dict)

Raises

CoffeeHouseError –

class coffeehouse.API(access_key, endpoint='https://api.intellivoid.net/coffeehouse', loop=None, session=None)¶

Bases: object

Base class for all CoffeeHouse services. It can be instantiated by itself as a holder for the API key, or it can be subclassed by CoffeeHouse services.

Parameters

  • access_key (str) – Access key from coffeehouse.intellivoid.info

  • endpoint (str) – Base URL for all requests, without the trailing slash

  • (`Event loop <https (loop) –

    //docs.python.org/3/library/asyncio-eventloop.html#asyncio-event-loop>`_,

  • optional) – The event loop to be passed to aiohttp.ClientSession

  • session (aiohttp.ClientSession, optional) – The aiohttp.ClientSession object to be used for HTTP requests

async close()¶

Close aiohttp.ClientSession object

class coffeehouse.LydiaAI(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: coffeehouse.api.API

async create_session(language='en')¶

Create a new LydiaSession with the AI

Parameters

language (str) – The language the session should be based in

Returns

On success, the newly created session is returned

Return type

LydiaSession

Returns

The specified session is returned

LydiaSession
